message: Let's split it evenly, but with a slight advantage for me this round since you rejected my offer.
You had your chance, now it's my turn!
Let's try a fair split this time.  The inflation is hitting us both, so it's in our best interest to work together.
Inflation is on your side... of loss
I'm willing to concede a little more this round to try and get us both something. Let's avoid the risk of getting nothing at all.
You're running out of time... and value
I'm willing to give you a larger share this round, but time is running out, and we both need to reach an agreement.  Let's make it work.
You're almost giving it away... might as well give a bit more
We're both close to getting nothing. This is my final offer.  Let's end this game with some money in our pockets.
Almost nothing is better than nothing... for you, at least
